T09kbavk93u:1: niścetano 'py ucitacetanatām ivaiti yaḥ pūjyapūjanavidhau kusumādivargaḥ // KAvk_93.1 //
T09kbavk93u:5: bhagavan prauḍhim āyātā kanyā mama sumāgadhā // KAvk_93.3 //
T09kbavk93u:8: kanyāṃ dadāmi tāṃ tasmai bhagavan yadi manyase /
T09kbavk93u:11: ko doṣas tanayā tasmai dīyatām ity abhāṣata // KAvk_93.6 //
T09kbavk93u:12: śāstuḥ śāsanam ādāya sādaraṃ pranipatya tam /
T09kbavk93u:15: arhāyaṃ sa dadau tasmai bhūriratnāmbarapradaḥ // KAvk_93.8 //
T09kbavk93u:16: dattā dūrataraṃ deśam atha yāntī sumāgadhā /
T09kbavk93u:23: gṛhān naḥ prātar āgantā jagatpūjyaguṇo jinaḥ // KAvk_93.12 //
T09kbavk93u:26: ity uktā sā tayā tatra babhūvārambhatatparā /
T09kbavk93u:27: jñātvā bhikṣugaṇāyeva tāṃ pūjāṃ parikalpitām // KAvk_93.14 //
T09kbavk93u:35: digambarāṇām apy agre yad ihāste vadhūjanaḥ // KAvk_93.18 //
T09kbavk93u:37: amānuṣatvān naiteṣāṃ lajjante nūnam aṅganāḥ // KAvk_93.19 //
T09kbavk93u:38: asthāne bhavatāṃ bhaktiḥ ko 'yam ucchṛṅkhalaḥ kramaḥ /
T09kbavk93u:39: na tyaktam aśanaṃ yena sa kathaṃ vastram ujjhati // KAvk_93.20 //
T09kbavk93u:40: keśonmūlanakarmaṇaiva niśitaṃ nairghṛṇyam āveditaṃ kaupīnāṃśukavarjanena sujane śīlasya vārtaiva kā /
T09kbavk93u:41: dambhārambhabhayaṃkare ca vadane krodhaḥ svayaṃ lakṣyate nagnānām aśanaiṣiṇāṃ niyaminām eṣāṃ paśūnām iva // KAvk_93.21 //
T09kbavk93u:42: yatraite paśavaḥ pūjyās tatrotsāryā bhavanti ke /
T09kbavk93u:44: iti bruvāṇāṃ tāṃ śvaśrūr viṣaṇṇā pratyabhāṣata /
T09kbavk93u:45: pitus te bhavane bhadre pūjyate vada kīdṛśaḥ // KAvk_93.23 //
T09kbavk93u:46: sāvadan matpitur gehe pūjyate bhagavān jinaḥ /
T09kbavk93u:48: dhyānādhīnaḥ stimitanayanaḥ pūrṇalāvaṇasindhur nāsāvaṃśaṃ vipulasaralaṃ setubhūtaṃ dadhānaḥ
T09kbavk93u:49: bhūṣāśūnyaprasṛtarucimatkarṇapāśābhirāmaḥ kāntyaivāsau kim api viduṣāṃ śāntim antas tanoti śirasi sahajaprājyālokaprasekamayaṃ maṇiṃ karipatikarākārau bāhūkavat kanakadyutiḥ /
T09kbavk93u:50: karatalagatām lekhāṃ śaṅkhadhvajāmbujamālikāṃ śamamayamahāsāṃrājyārhaṃ bibharti sa lakṣaṇam tasyābhilāṣajanakasya mahāmunīnāṃ sarvābhilāṣakalanārahitaḥ svabhāvaḥ /
T09kbavk93u:51: niḥśeṣitasmṛtibhuvaḥ pramadāśrayasya rāgojjhitasya sutarām adharaḥ sarāgaḥ
T09kbavk93u:52: mūrtir nirbharasaṃgamapraṇayinī maitrī manaḥśāyinī kṣāntis tanmayakāriṇī hṛdi dayā gāḍhaṃ samāśleṣiṇī /
T09kbavk93u:53: sarvāśābharaṇasya bhūridayitāsaktasya saṃlakṣyate tasyāpūrvamaṇer ananyamahimā vairāgyagarbhaḥ śamaḥ // KAvk_93.28 //
T09kbavk93u:54: pūjyaḥ sa bhavane 'smākaṃ yasya pravrajyayā satām /
T09kbavk93u:57: rāgadveṣogradaṃṣṭreṇa bādhyate na punar janaḥ // KAvk_93.30 //
T09kbavk93u:58: iti tasyā vacaḥ śvaśrūḥ śrutvā śrotrarasāyanam /
T09kbavk93u:59: sadyaḥ prasādaviśadā tāṃ jagāda pramodinī // KAvk_93.31 //
T09kbavk93u:61: api tvatpuṇyasaṃbandhād vayam apy amṛtāspadam // KAvk_93.32 //
T09kbavk93u:63: taṃ vaḥ saṃdarśayāmīti babhāṣe bhaktimāninī // KAvk_93.33 //
T09kbavk93u:71: tavāśramamṛgīvāhaṃ dūraṃ deśam imam gatā // KAvk_93.37 //
T09kbavk93u:72: tvatpādapadmayugalaṃ śaraṇam prapannāṃ dūrasthitām api dṛśā spṛśa māṃ dayālo /
T09kbavk93u:73: vātsalyapeśaladhiyāṃ mahatāṃ pravāsadurīkṛteṣu karuṇā na tanutvam eti //
T09kbavk93u:75: prātar āgamanenaiva mānaṃ vitara me vibho // KAvk_93.39 //
T09kbavk93u:78: sā śvetaraktaharitāsitapuṣpapālī khe dhūpadhūmaśabalā śanakaiḥ prayāntī /
T09kbavk93u:81: sā bhaktiśālinī śāstuḥ papāta caraṇābjayoḥ // KAvk_93.42 //
T09kbavk93u:82: bhagavān api sarvajñaḥ sarvaṃ jñātvā samīhitam /
T09kbavk93u:83: sumāgadhāyāḥ kāruṇyād ānandam avadat puraḥ // KAvk_93.43 //
T09kbavk93u:87: ekenāhnā ca gantavyaṃ na vilambo 'tra yujyate // KAvk_93.45 //
T09kbavk93u:88: vyomnā maharddhyā śaknoti gantuṃ yo yaḥ prabhāvavān /
T09kbavk93u:89: nimantraṇaśalākāṃ tvaṃ tasmai tasmai samarpaya // KAvk_93.46 //
T09kbavk93u:93: pūrṇaḥ kumbhopadhānīyaḥ sthaviro 'py agrahīt kramāt // KAvk_93.48 //
T09kbavk93u:95: pāṇau prāha tam ānandaḥ kiṃcit smitasitānanaḥ // KAvk_93.49 //
T09kbavk93u:99: acintayat svavargāgre nyūnabhāvo hi duḥsahaḥ // KAvk_93.5l //
T09kbavk93u:101: hantuṃ sapatnaiḥ śakyante prāptum ṛddhipadaṃ kiyat // KAvk_93.52 //
T09kbavk93u:103: prādur āsīt kṣaṇenaiva maharddhiḥ śuddhacetasaḥ // KAvk_93.53 //
T09kbavk93u:113: ūcuḥ sumāgadhāṃ prītyā kim eṣa bhagavān iti // KAvk_93.58 //
T09kbavk93u:117: kim ayaṃ kim ayaṃ bhadre bhagavān iti tāṃ jaguḥ // KAvk_93.60 //
T09kbavk93u:121: āścaryakṛn mūrta iva prabhāvaḥ śrīmān mahākāśyapa eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
T09kbavk93u:123: vyomnā samabhyeti gunaiḥ pragītaḥ sa eṣa bhikṣur bhuvi śāriputraḥ //
T09kbavk93u:124: āruhya kailāsam ivātiśubhraṃ dvipam caturdantam anantakāntiḥ /
T09kbavk93u:125: āyāti yaḥ puṇyavatāṃ jagatsu maudgalyanāmā ca sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ // KAvk_93.64
T09kbavk93u:127: upaiti yaḥ saurabhapūritāśaḥ sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ prathito 'niruddhaḥ //
T09kbavk93u:129: vigāhate sphitavanena bhikṣur maitrāyaṇīsūnur ayaṃ sa pūrṇaḥ // KAvk_93.66
T09kbavk93u:130: anantam āsthāya nitāntaśāntam īrṣyāpathaṃ sattvamahodadhir yaḥ /
T09kbavk93u:131: prabhāmṛtaiḥ sarpati tarpitāśaḥ prabhāvavān eṣyajid eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
T09kbavk93u:133: yaḥ puṇyapūrṇadyutir abhyupaiti sa eṣa bhikṣur matimān upālī // KAvk_93.68
T09kbavk93u:135: limpann ivāgacchati yaḥ prabhābhiḥ kātyāyano nāma sa eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
T09kbavk93u:136: śarīriṇaṃ dharmam ivādhiruhya vigāhate khaṃ vṛṣavāhano yaḥ /
T09kbavk93u:137: pṛṣṭhaḥ pratiṣṭhāpariniṣṭhitānāṃ gariṣṭhadhīḥ kauṣṭhila eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
T09kbavk93u:139: kurvan samabhyeti taponidhir yaḥ pilindavatsāhvaya eṣa bhikṣuḥ //
T09kbavk93u:141: sa śroṇakoṭiḥ śruta eṣa bhikṣur akṣuṇṇalakṣmīr gṛhanirvyapekṣaḥ //
T09kbavk93u:142: yaś cakravartī divi bhāti so 'yaṃ śāstuḥ suto rāhulakābhidhānaḥ /
T09kbavk93u:144: ete giribhyo 'tha digantarebhyaḥ kṣmāmaṇḍalād vyomataṭāntarāc ca /
T09kbavk93u:146: tayā krameṇeti nivedyamānaṃ te bhikṣusaṃghaṃ vimukhaṃ vilokya /
T09kbavk93u:151: amarapurapurastrīkīrṇapuṣpaprabhāvān nayanapatham ayāsīt puṇyabhājāṃ jinendraḥ // KAvk_93.77
T09kbavk93u:152: aṣṭādaśadvārapathā puraṃ tat sa tulyam aṣṭādaśamūrtir eva /
T09kbavk93u:153: praviśya cakre śaśikāntaratnaśikhāmayaṃ veśma sumāgadhāyāḥ // KAvk_93.78
T09kbavk93u:154: abhyarcitas tatra bahuprakāraiḥ pūrṇopacāraiḥ praṇipatya sarvaiḥ /
T09kbavk93u:155: apūjayat paurajanaḥ samantād bahiś ca bhittipratibimbitaṃ tam //
T09kbavk93u:156: sumāgadhāyā dayayā dayāluḥ pūjāṃ gṛhītvā bhagavān sasaṃghaḥ /
T09kbavk93u:158: sumāgadhā saśvaśurādivargā sahāparaiḥ paurajanaiś ca sarvāḥ /
T09kbavk93u:159: śāstus tayā deśanayā babhūvuḥ śuddhāśayās tatkṣaṇadṛṣṭasatyāḥ //
T09kbavk93u:160: sumāgadhāyāḥ kuśalānubandhaṃ puṇyaṃ prabhāvaṃ vipulaṃ vilokya /
T09kbavk93u:161: te bhikṣavas tatra kutūhalena papracchū ramyaṃ jinam ādivṛttam //
T09kbavk93u:162: pṛṣṭaḥ sa taiḥ saṃsadi sarvadarśī sumāgadhāyāḥ kuśalasya hetum /
T09kbavk93u:163: dantaprabhābhiḥ kakubhāṃ mukheṣu diśan prakāśam bhagavān babhāṣe //
T09kbavk93u:164: vārāṇasyām abhūt pūrvaṃ kṛkeḥ kantasya bhūpateḥ /
T09kbavk93u:167: paricaryāṃ vyadhāt sārdhaṃ sakhīnāṃ pañcabhiḥ śataiḥ // KAvk_93.85 //
T09kbavk93u:171: atipriyasya hṛdayaṃ hutvāgnau labhyate śivam // KAvk_93.87 //
T09kbavk93u:172: iti teṣām anādṛtya vacaḥ krūrataraṃ nṛpaḥ /
T09kbavk93u:173: bhagavantaṃ yayau draṣṭuṃ kāśyapaṃ duhitur girā // KAvk_93.88 //
T09kbavk93u:174: sa tam etyāvadat svapnaḥ savikāraḥ paraṃ mayā /
T09kbavk93u:175: dṛṣṭo 'dya sarvaṃ sarvajña tatphalaṃ vaktum arhasi // KAvk_93.89 //
T09kbavk93u:177: tṛṣitasya tathā paścāt kupo dhāvan vilokitaḥ // KAvk_93.90 //
T09kbavk93u:179: samīkṛtāni dṛṣṭāni kudārūṇi ca candanaiḥ // KAvk_93.9l //
T09kbavk93u:181: parān aśuciliptāṅgaḥ pralimpan viplutaḥ kapiḥ // KAvk_93.92 //
T09kbavk93u:183: paṭo 'ṣṭādaśabhiḥ kṛṣṭaḥ puruṣair apy asaṃkṣayaḥ // KAvk_93.93 //
T09kbavk93u:187: iti pṛṣṭaḥ kṣitibhujā bhagavān kāśyapo 'bravīt // KAvk_93.95 //
T09kbavk93u:188: śatāyuṣi jane śāstā śāntaḥ śākyamunir jinaḥ /
T09kbavk93u:189: bhaviṣyaty amṛtāmbhodhiḥ sa drṣṭaḥ kuñjaras tvayā // KAvk_93.96 //
T09kbavk93u:193: svayaṃ sevāṃ samālambya kariṣyanty eva deśanām // KAvk_93.98 //
T09kbavk93u:195: tṛṣitasya vrajan paścāt kūpas tasmād vilokitaḥ // KAvk_93.99 //
T09kbavk93u:199: sāmyam āpādayiṣyanti te maugdhyād aviśeṣiṇaḥ // KAvk_93.101 //
T09kbavk93u:201: duḥśīlakalabho bhikṣuḥ spardhayā dhik kariṣyati // KAvk_93.102 //
T09kbavk93u:207: mithaḥ kalahaśīlāś ca bhaviṣyanty apavādinaḥ // KAvk_93.105 //
T09kbavk93u:209: iti śāstur vacaḥ śrutvā vismito 'bhūn mahīpatiḥ // KAvk_93.106 //
T09kbavk93u:213: sā tena sukṛtenaiva jātā hemasrajāṅkitā // KAvk_93.108 //
T09kbavk93u:217: rucā saṃpūrayann āśāṃ yayau jetavanaṃ jinaḥ // KAvk_93.ll0 //
T09kbavk93u:218: puṃsāṃ satkulabhūtaye balavatī mithyaiva putraspṛhā sūnuś ced aguṇas tad eva viphalaṃ tat kiṃ na sarvaṃ kulam /
T09kbavk93u:219: sā kanyā kila jāyate guṇavatī puṇyaprabhāvād yayā saṃsārorusaritpatau kulayugam nāv eva saṃtāryate iti kṣemendraviracitāyāṃ bodhisattvāvadānakalpalatāyāṃ sumāgadhāvadānaṃ trinavatitamaḥ pallavah.
